main: ^Hey there, stranger. Are you in search of adventure or perhaps some goods to buy? I've got a few options for you.
^You're nothing but a washed-up has-been! Prepare to face my wrath!

c-0: ^Step right up! I've gathered a collection of weapons, armor, and potions that might pique your interest. Take a look and let me know if anything catches your eye.
c-1: ^ is visibly disturbed, steps back and looks at you confused.
^"You're confident you want this person gone" Attack
^You calm down, take a deep breath and apologise
^No harm no foul, stranger. Everybody's on edge these days in this village.

c-2: ^Ah, my friend, that's a story worth telling. I used to be a renowned adventurer, traveling far and wide, facing formidable foes. But fate had its way with me. One day, a fearsome dragon named Sylvaria laid waste to my hometown. I fought valiantly, but alas, I lost everything. Now, I've found solace here, selling my wares and sharing my tales with those who lend an ear.
^ why the villagers are so afraid of strangers

c-0: ^A good question. And there is a good answer for that. The nearby forest has become a den for a group of troublesome bandits, causing distress to the villagers. I need someone brave enough to drive them out. Will you take up this quest?
^I knew I could count on you. Bring justice to them and you shall be rewarded.
c-1: ^That is all right. I can understand if you're too scared to even go near that place. Do feel free to come back if you change your mind.
